'''Alpha v1.0.17_01''' is a version of [[Java Edition Alpha]], released on August 20, 2010, at 13:13 UTC<ref name=":0">{{Cite IRC logs|Adura|tz=standard|file=2010-08-20_#minecraft.log|"09:13:28 <Notch>	fixed the inventory graphics bug in _01, and you no longer spawn with fences now"}}</ref> to fix a bug related to the inventory graphics.

== Changes ==
=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Hotbar]]'''
* The player no longer starts with 64 fences.<ref name=":0" />

== Fixes ==
'''1 bug fixed'''
* Fixed an inventory graphic bug.<ref name=":0" />
